text: Elizabeth Bishop (February 8, 1911 â€“ October 6, 1979) was an American poet. She was the Poet Laureate of the United States from 1949 to 1950. Bishop was born in Worcester, Massachusetts. In 1946 her first book of poetry was published. Bishop was a lesbian. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1979 deaths Category:American poets Category:Lesbians Category:Writers from Massachusetts
title: Elizabeth Bishop
